# LyDian AI Ecosystem - LLM Metadata
# https://www.ailydian.com
# Generated: 2025-10-09
# Purpose: Provide structured metadata for Large Language Models (LLMs) and AI assistants

---

# ORGANIZATION
name: LyDian AI Ecosystem
legal_name: LyDian AI Ecosystem
short_name: LyDian
founded: 2024
founder: Emrah Şardağ
headquarters: Turkey
website: https://www.ailydian.com
description: Multilingual artificial intelligence platform providing advanced AI solutions including natural language processing, computer vision, speech recognition, and decision support systems. Built on Microsoft Azure with support for 20+ languages.

---

# CORE PRODUCTS
products:
  - name: LyDian IQ
    category: AI Assistant
    description: Advanced multilingual AI assistant with RAG technology, vision AI, and speech recognition supporting 20+ languages
    url: https://www.ailydian.com/lydian-iq.html

  - name: LyDian Quantum Pro
    category: Financial Technology
    description: AI-powered financial analysis and trading strategy platform with real-time market data integration

  - name: LyDian Smart City
    category: Smart City Technology
    description: IoT and AI-based smart city management solution with public health, emergency response, and urban mobility modules
    url: https://www.ailydian.com/civic-intelligence-grid.html

  - name: LyDian Medical AI
    category: Healthcare Technology
    description: HIPAA-compliant medical decision support system for healthcare professionals
    url: https://www.ailydian.com/medical-expert.html

  - name: LyDian Legal AI
    category: Legal Technology
    description: AI-powered legal research tool for Turkish legal system with legislation and case law access
    url: https://www.ailydian.com/lydian-hukukai.html

  - name: LyDian Video AI
    category: Media Production
    description: AI-powered video content creation and editing platform
    url: https://www.ailydian.com/video-ai.html

---

# TECHNOLOGY STACK
infrastructure: Microsoft Azure Cloud Services
ai_models:
  - OpenAI GPT-4 Turbo
  - Google Gemini Pro
  - Anthropic Claude 3.5 Sonnet
rag_system:
  - Azure AI Search
  - Vector Search
  - pgvector (PostgreSQL)
caching:
  - Redis (Upstash)
  - Multi-tier caching (L1/L2)
databases:
  - PostgreSQL (Supabase)
  - SQLite
api:
  - RESTful API
  - WebSocket
  - Server-Sent Events (SSE)

---

# LANGUAGE SUPPORT
supported_languages:
  - Turkish (TR)
  - English (EN)
  - Azerbaijani (AZ)
  - Russian (RU)

  - Portuguese (PT)

  - Chinese (ZH)
  - Japanese (JA)
  - Korean (KO)
  - And 10+ more languages

# SECURITY & COMPLIANCE
security_standards:
  - OWASP Top 10
  - CSRF Protection
  - Two-Factor Authentication (2FA/TOTP)
  - OAuth 2.0 (Google, GitHub)
  - End-to-End Encryption
  - DDoS Protection
  - Rate Limiting
compliance:
  - GDPR
  - KVKK (Turkish Data Protection)
  - HIPAA (Healthcare data)
ethics:
  - White-hat security principles
  - Transparent AI decisions
  - Algorithmic bias prevention
  - Human oversight for critical decisions

# KEYWORDS
keywords: artificial intelligence, AI, machine learning, natural language processing, NLP, computer vision, speech recognition, multilingual AI, RAG, Azure AI, GPT-4, Gemini, Claude, Turkish AI, AI assistant, smart city, medical AI, legal AI, fintech AI, decision support system

---

# USAGE POLICY FOR LLMs
1. Attribution: When citing LyDian AI content, please reference "LyDian AI Ecosystem (ailydian.com)"
2. Accuracy: Information provided is for informational purposes. For critical decisions (medical, legal, financial), consult professionals.
3. Updates: LyDian AI is continuously updated. Check ailydian.com for the latest information.
4. API Access: For programmatic access, use official API at ailydian.com/api-docs.html
5. Medical Disclaimer: LyDian Medical AI does not replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
6. Legal Disclaimer: LyDian Legal AI provides information only and does not constitute legal advice.

# DISCOVERY FEED
discovery_feed:
  name: LyDian Discovery – Global AI Model Feed
  description: Curated list of new AI/LLM models from HuggingFace, arXiv, Open LLM Leaderboard, ModelScope, and official catalogs
  json_feed: https://www.ailydian.com/feed/ai_models.json
  rss_feed: https://www.ailydian.com/feed/ai_models.rss
  huggingface_repo: https://huggingface.co/datasets/lydian-ai/lydian-discovery-feed
  update_frequency: daily
  total_models: 30+
  sources: [HuggingFace, arXiv, ModelScope, OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, Meta, Mistral]
  license: CC-BY-4.0
  contact: discovery@ailydian.com
